metadata.description: Vibe coding tools that turn new builders into confident AI-first practitioners. Built on the Work Loop methodology.

plugins.name: prd-manager
plugins.description: Complete PRD management suite. Generate, update, and compare PRDs throughout your build process.

plugins.name: work-loop-coach
plugins.description: Embeds the Work Loop methodology (Articulate → Build → Prompt → Execute → Evaluate → Iterate) into your building process.
